mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST(USERID, LOCAL, TITLE, CONTENT, RATING, SECRET, HEADERIMG) VALUES( #{userId}, #{local}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rating}, #{secret}, #{headerImg})
mapper.select: SELECT POSTID, USERID, LOCAL, TITLE, RATING, SECRET, HEADERIMG, CONTENT, CREATEDDATE FROM POST WHERE SECRET = 0
SELECT POSTID, USERID, LOCAL, TITLE, RATING, SECRET, HEADERIMG, CONTENT, CREATEDDATE FROM POST WHERE (SECRET = 0) AND (LOCAL = #{local})
